body: You are able to sense the motives of others and use that sense to bolster your magic against dispelling. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Sense Motive checks, and Sense Motive is always a class skill for you. In addition, your caster level is treated as 1 level higher for the purposes of any attempts to dispel your magic.
name: Outcast's Intuition
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Basic Traits/Magic Traits/Outcasts Intuition
